column1: Kata Robata////Uchi priced but not quite on the Uchi level
column2: Kata Robata offers decent vegetarian sushi at a bit of a premium. For $60
column3: I ended up with four-ish dishes
column4: one of which came out after the meal because the waiter forgot to bring it out the first time! He was really kind and actually took if off the bill.
